name: Glittering Ruby
data: It decreases the users strength somewhat.
It decreases the users dexterity somewhat.
It decreases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence like a god.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
Glittering Ruby is an artifact of the Goddess Kirvana.
Glittering Ruby can 'rprotect' the wearer from a certain spell.
